Blazor Toolkit
Table of Contents

Class ApiUrlBuilder

Namespace
DevInstance.BlazorToolkit.Http
Assembly
DevInstance.BlazorToolkit.dll

The ApiUrlBuilder class is used to construct URLs for API endpoints. It allows adding path segments and query parameters to the URL.

var url = ApiUrlBuilder.Create("api/companies").Path(id).Path("employees").Query("firstname", "John");
Console.Write(url);

Result:

api/companies/92387/employees?firstname=John
